org.javascool
Class Jvs2Java

java.lang.Object
  org.javascool.Jvs2Java

public class Jvs2Java
extends Object

This factory defines how a Jvs code is translated into a Java code and compiled. The goal of the Jvs syntax is to ease the syntax when starting to program in an imperative language, like Java.

- This factory calls the java compiler as in the jdk5 (and earlier) case, but still works with jdk6. It is designed to be used in standalone mode.

See Also:

Method Detail

compile

public static String compile(String path)
Compiles a Java code source.
The jdk tool.jar must be in the path.

Parameters:
path - The file path to compile.
Returns:
An empty string if the compilation succeeds, else the error message's text.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if an I/O exception occurs during command execution.

error2output

public static String error2output(String out)

getPanel

public static JPanel getPanel(String proglet)
Returns the proglet panel.

Parameters:
proglet - The proglet class name.
Returns:
The panel corresponding to the proglet, if any, else null;

isReserved

public static boolean isReserved(String word)
Tests if a word is reserved to use because it is a Java reserved word.

Parameters:
word - The word to test.
Returns:
true if it reserved, else false.

isRunning

public static boolean isRunning()
Tests if the proglet run is done.

load

public static Object load(String path)
Dynamically loads a Java class to be used during this session.

Parameters:
path - The path to the java class to load. The java class is supposed to belong to the "default" package, i.e. not to belong to a package.
Returns:
An instantiation of this Java class. If the object is a runnable, the current runnable is set.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if an I/O exception occurs during command execution.
IllegalArgumentException - If the Java class name is not valid.

main

public static void main(String[] usage)
Translates Jvs files to Java files.

Parameters:
usage - java org.javascool.Jvs2Java [-reformat] [-compile] input-file

-reformat : Reformat the Jvs code

-compile : Compile the java classes

reformat

public static String reformat(String text)
Reformats a piece of Java source code.

- This is a restrictive mechanism dedicated to the JavaScool sub-language of Java.

Parameters:
text - The text to reformat.
Returns:
The reformated text.

run

public static void run(boolean start)
Runs/Stops the proglet pupil's program.

Parameters:
start - If true starts the proglet pupil's program, if defined. If false stops the proglet pupil's program.

run

public static void run(String proglet)
Runs/Stops a proglet demo..

Parameters:
proglet - The proglet name.

translate

public static void translate(String path,
                             String proglet)
Translates a Jvs code source.

Parameters:
path - The file path to translate: A .jvs file is read and the corresponding .java file is written.
proglet - The proglet to use. Default is to make all proglets usable.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if an I/O exception occurs during file translation.
IllegalArgumentException - If the Java class name is not valid.
